name: Bling Easy
overview:
BlingEasy allows you to create personalized, custom photos by adding thousands of animations and effects to your photos. This web based technology (no downloads required) allows you to improve your traditional boring photos by making it easy to:

  • Add your own custom text
  • Draw on your photos
  • Drag and drop images and animations onto your photo
  • Resize your photo
  • Add cool backgrounds with a click of the mouse
  • Send your photo as a greeting card and much more.

There are literally thousands of effects you can add to your photos and its all free!

Once your photo is created you can easily use it on your Myspace, Facebook, Orkut, Friendster, or any other personal web page(s). BlingEasy transforms your photo into a .gif format allowing you to download your new blinged out photo directly to your PC so you can easily use it anywhere on the web and even send it as a greeting card.
